name: A Donation of Mageweave
tooltip:
A Donation of Mageweave

Mageweave is running low, and we could use your help to replenish our stocks!  By counting on the community as a whole, we would only need a donation of 60 pieces of mageweave cloth from you to enable us to reach our goal.  Such generosity would not go unnoticed by the Undercity, I assure you!

If you have the sixty pieces of mageweave cloth on you and are ready to donate them, I'm able to take them from you now.

Requirements:
- Mageweave Cloth x 60
